Blog.post: saw amfram today, the little faggot was trying to rollerblade at the square. hes so gay like you wouldnt beleive. a few weeks ago he called the cops on me and julian, no sweat tho the pigs droped us home is all we were going that way anyhows, julian spat in the back of the pigmobile lol. amfram was shittin when he saw me, started getting his mobile out that little fag is so gay. i skated rite up to him and he actually pissed his pants lololololol. julian punched his face and took his mobile and his money and went to the pool hall. i went home for my dinner. chicken dippers are the best dood.

im sick and fucking tired of kiddies sucking jacksons balls and calling him the greatest, and claiming if it wasn't for him, we we wouldn't be doing half the tricks today. "without crack jackson you wouldn't be doing kickflips or heelflips or shuvits and shit" theres nothing special about jackson. the idea of spining a board round and landing back on is not a genious idea, someone else would have thought of it had there not been a crack jackson. so stop blowing a flatground lover who is no more gifted with ideas than you or me. besides, hes really gay and maplethorns mom says hes a tard with a very small penis, and she would no. and even tho he cliams to do all his own stunts he doesnt, its not even him, its some other no talent dood. probly the fatdicklovingasshole skatepop. gay.

sum dood, calls hiself 'Skatepop' lol or some shit has been posting all this dum shit on his blog for weeks now. i tried not to but i hav been forced to do somthing bout it. this kid thinks hes the real pope! and thinks he can skate! dood eveybody nos the pope cant skate! he rides round in that glass case lol, he can never skate is he even alive? peeple are actually thinking this kid is for reel, wot is the world comin to? who are this kids parents man they hav a lot to anser for this duuds really fucked up, reel issues and shit.

ok, heres the deal...im bout to be fourteen, and my dad pretty much disowns me(which isnt a big loss). but he wont let me live my own life. heres a list of things he hates bout me... 1.how long my hair is 2.the kind of hat i wear(trucker) 3.my left nostril being pierced with a pirate ring 4.my different color shoe laces (red + green!!!) 5.the fact that i skate 6.how baggy i wear my pants(man there baggy,room for 3 more duud) 7.what i want to do when i get older 8.that i spend most of my money on skate gear 9.that i play electric guitar 10. the fact that im not like him 11. the clothes i wear 12.the music i listen to i guess thats pretty much it...what do yall think i should do? im tired of him alwayz gettin on my case, i really need some help... oh yeah, and i cant stand up to him, hes a captain in the air force (which means hes a hard ass.) and i dont want any stoopid replies from f8kers like skatepop and his dum frends. assholes.
